robot.sensors

Class Coordinates

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.sensors.Coordinates

  • public class Coordinates
extends java.lang.Object
    Construct that takes in the distance data about a block then finds the block's corners and line slopes to generate a virtual representation of object in question.
    Author:
    Michael
